title: LinkedIn Learning Essential Training Challenge
hook: Conquer this LinkedIn Learning challenge and officially win at adulting. Family, friends, recruiters, and your future self will thank you.
description: Complete essential training courses on LinkedIn Learning for Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, and Adobe InDesign. This challenge is designed to build a strong foundation in design and web development tools.
requirements: Dedication to complete all essential training courses
reward: Essential Training Badge. A LinkedIn profile that stands out to recruiters.

title: Project Revision & Badge Challenge
hook: Turn feedback into a finished masterpieceâ€”revise your projects, impress your instructors, and earn that badge sticker like a pro.
description: Take your instructor's feedback on a project and implement the revisions. Present the updated project to your instructor for review. If you successfully update your project and include it in your portfolio, you will earn a badge sticker, and your work will be showcased.
requirements: Completion of a project with instructor feedback
Incorporation of revisions into the project
reward: Project Revision Sticker. Rad Sense of Accomplishment.

title: AI-Powered Resume Challenge
hook: Optimize your resume with AI tools and land the job of your dreams.
description: Use AI tools like LinkedIn Resume Builder, Grammarly, and Jobscan to optimize your resume. Focus on clarity, tailoring it to specific roles, and highlighting your key achievements. Learn how to use AI suggestions to make your resume stand out to recruiters.
requirements: Access to AI tools like LinkedIn Resume Builder, Grammarly, or Jobscan
reward: Optimized Resume Badge. A job-ready resume that stands out.

title: Create Your Personal Branding Kit
hook: Make your mark with a cohesive personal brand that screams 'hire me.'
description: Design a logo, business card, and email signature for yourself. Ensure consistency in colors, typography, and messaging across all assets.
requirements: A theme or direction for your personal brand
reward: Brand Builder Badge. Polished assets that leave a lasting impression.

title: LinkedIn Profile Optimization Challenge
hook: Optimize your LinkedIn profile to make a lasting impression on recruiters.
description: Revamp your LinkedIn profile by adding certifications, a strong summary, updated projects, and a professional profile picture. Learn how to use keywords to increase visibility.
requirements: Willingness to research and implement best practices
reward: Professional Profile Badge. A LinkedIn profile that wows.
